data_table.description: The data table contains subjects IDs, consent information, affection status, and mapping to subject aliases.

variable.name: SUBJID
variable.comment: T1DGC Analytic ID - an 8-digit identifer - or UNKNOWN-CASE-n

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC
variable.value: Disease-Specific (Type 1 diabetes, its complications and other autoimmune diseases, IRB) (DS-T1DR-IRB)

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJID
variable.comment: JDRF/WT DIL subjectid - 9 digits plus checkletter - or UNKNOWN-CASE-n
